law.catch_line: The Board shall first distribute bodies or body parts that are under its exclusive control equitably...
law.text: The Board shall first distribute bodies or body parts that are under its exclusive control equitably among the schools described in § 5-403 of this subtitle, and then, at the Board's discretion, distribute bodies or body parts to other medical study programs. These bodies or body parts may be used only for the promotion and application of medical sciences.
